io.vertx.core.dns.impl.netty

Class DnsQueryEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerAdapter
      • io.netty.channel.ChannelOutboundHandlerAdapter
        • io.netty.handler.codec.MessageToByteEncoder<DnsQuery>
          • io.vertx.core.dns.impl.netty.DnsQueryEncoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.netty.channel.ChannelHandler, io.netty.channel.ChannelOutboundHandler

    public class DnsQueryEncoder
extends io.netty.handler.codec.MessageToByteEncoder<DnsQuery>
    DnsQueryEncoder accepts DnsQuery and encodes to ByteBuf. This class also contains methods for encoding parts of DnsQuery's such as the header and questions.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface io.netty.channel.ChannelHandler

        io.netty.channel.ChannelHandler.Sharable

    • Method Detail

      • encodeQuery

        protected static void encodeQuery(DnsQuery query,
                                  io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf buf)
        Encodes a query and writes it to a ByteBuf.
        Parameters:
        query - the DnsQuery being encoded
        buf - the ByteBuf the query will be written to

      • encode

        protected void encode(io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerContext ctx,
                      DnsQuery query,
                      io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf out)
               throws Exception
        Encodes a query and writes it to a ByteBuf. Queries are sent to a DNS server and a response will be returned from the server. The encoded ByteBuf is written to the specified ByteBuf.
        Specified by:
        encode in class io.netty.handler.codec.MessageToByteEncoder<DnsQuery>
        Parameters:
        ctx - the ChannelHandlerContext this DnsQueryEncoder belongs to
        query - the query being encoded
        out - the ByteBuf to which encoded messages should be written
        Throws:
        Exception
